/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the urban landscape. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape.
